project.description: Deploy a Redis VM as a Stemcell smoke test.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STEMCELL_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: HTTP(S) url to any BOSH Stemcell accessible to Jenkins.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: JOB_INFRASTRUCTURE_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Name of the infrastructure directory from which your smoke test yaml fragments will be read.
Ie: ${CONFIG_REPO}/infrastructures/${INFRASTRUCTURE_DIR}

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!bash -e GITHUB_HASH="${GIT_URL}/tree/${GIT_COMMIT}" GITHUB_INF_DIR_URL="${GITHUB_HASH}/infrastructures/${JOB_INFRASTRUCTURE_DIR}/redis" STEMCELL_DESC=`echo ${STEMCELL_URL} | sed 's/.*\///' | sed 's/.tgz//'` echo "**************************************" echo "Generating description for build" echo "**************************************" export DESC="desc STEMCELL: ${STEMCELL_DESC} JOB_INFRASTRUCTURE_DIR: ${JOB_INFRASTRUCTURE_DIR}" echo $DESC echo "**************************************" RUBY_VERSION=$(ruby -v | awk '{print $2}') export GEM_HOME=/var/vcap/store/gems/$RUBY_VERSION/$JOB_NAME export GEM_PATH=$GEM_HOME export PATH=$PATH:$GEM_HOME/bin gem install bundler -v 1.3.5 ( cd C3CI bundle # Setup parameters ST_RELEASE_FILE="`pwd`/redis-release/releases/redis-1.yml" ST_MANIFEST_FILE="`pwd`/../jobs/redis/redis-core.yml" ST_DIRECTOR_URL="https://${BOSH_MICRO_IP}:25555" ST_RELEASE_DIR="`pwd`/redis-release" ST_STEMCELL="${STEMCELL_URL}" ST_SPIFF_DIR="`pwd`/../infrastructures/${JOB_INFRASTRUCTURE_DIR}/redis" echo "**************************************" echo "Options being passed to bosh mediator:" echo "**************************************" echo "ST_RELEASE_FILE: ${ST_RELEASE_FILE}" echo "ST_MANIFEST_FILE: ${ST_MANIFEST_FILE}" echo "ST_DIRECTOR_URL: ${ST_DIRECTOR_URL}" echo "ST_STEMCELL: ${ST_STEMCELL}" echo "ST_SPIFF_DIR: ${ST_SPIFF_DIR}" echo "**************************************" bundle exec rake cf:upload_and_deploy_release[\ ${ST_RELEASE_FILE},\ ${ST_MANIFEST_FILE},\ ${ST_DIRECTOR_URL},\ ${ST_STEMCELL},\ ${ST_SPIFF_DIR}\ ] )
